Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student might attempt to draw two figures to represent students but with minimal detail or inaccurate proportions.
The student may draw a single straight line between two points, potentially showing an attempt to represent a string.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to correctly illustrate or label the string telephone device (may omit cups or use incorrect objects).
The student probably does not show how sound is used to send messages (no indication of sound waves or communication cues).
There is likely no representation of concept or understanding of communication over distance (might not connect the line to both students correctly or at all).
The student may fail to label or demonstrate the purpose of the device, as they might not understand its use for communication (absence of speech or listening elements).
The drawing might lack any indication or understanding of the interaction between the two students through the device.
